Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?At Trilogy, we see generative AI as more than a trend; we consider it the future scaffold of efficient software engineering. We see tools like Copilot, Cursor, and Code Interpreter as game-changers in the software industry, much like the Internet and cloud computing once were. If you're a seasoned software engineer with a keen interest in AI technologies, this role offers you a unique opportunity to blend your skills in both domains.Unlike many companies that only scratch the surface of AI's potential, Trilogy places a strong emphasis on the practical integration of generative AI into our engineering processes. Our methods aim for quick and tangible results, focusing on reusing and fine-tuning existing AI models to improve engineering outcomes.The primary responsibility in this position would be to develop a framework that effectively leverages AI tools within our engineering process. You'll propose and conduct experiments with generative AI to optimize problem-solving, solution design, and code generation. Additionally, you'll document these best practices in playbooks that will serve as invaluable resources for other engineering teams.You will adopt, test, and aggressively integrate new technologies, ultimately standardizing a tech stack that genuinely boosts productivity, allowing our engineers to concentrate on essential decision-making.If this sounds like the challenge you've been waiting for, apply now to be a part of our transformative journey!What You Will Be Doing Leading initiatives and experiments using generative AI to improve engineering processes such as code generation, problem decomposition, and troubleshootingDocumenting and continually refining guidelines that set the standard for how generative AI should be used in software engineeringTaking on the development of fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality
What You Won’t Be Doing Developing completely new AI models; instead, you will focus on using and/or fine-tuning existing modelsBeing confined to outdated technologies or a static tech stack that hinders innovation
AI Architect Key Responsibilities Establishing frameworks that integrate generative AI into our engineering processes to significantly boost productivity

If you're looking for an opportunity to spearhead transformation in a rapidly evolving sector, Skyvera is your next home.Skyvera is more than just another name in the telco industry. About the job
            

 
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?At Trilogy, we see generative AI as more than a trend; we consider it the future scaffold of efficient software engineering. We see tools like Copilot, Cursor, and Code Interpreter as game-changers in the software industry, much like the Internet and cloud computing once were. If you're a seasoned software engineer with a keen interest in AI technologies, this role offers you a unique opportunity to blend your skills in both domains.Unlike many companies that only scratch the surface of AI's potential, Trilogy places a strong emphasis on the practical integration of generative AI into our engineering processes. Our methods aim for quick and tangible results, focusing on reusing and fine-tuning existing AI models to improve engineering outcomes.The primary responsibility in this position would be to develop a framework that effectively leverages AI tools within our engineering process. You'll propose and conduct experiments with generative AI to optimize problem-solving, solution design, and code generation. Additionally, you'll document these best practices in playbooks that will serve as invaluable resources for other engineering teams.You will adopt, test, and aggressively integrate new technologies, ultimately standardizing a tech stack that genuinely boosts productivity, allowing our engineers to concentrate on essential decision-making.If this sounds like the challenge you've been waiting for, apply now to be a part of our transformative journey!What You Will Be Doing Leading initiatives and experiments using generative AI to improve engineering processes such as code generation, problem decomposition, and troubleshootingDocumenting and continually refining guidelines that set the standard for how generative AI should be used in software engineeringTaking on the development of fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality
What You Won’t Be Doing Developing completely new AI models; instead, you will focus on using and/or fine-tuning existing modelsBeing confined to outdated technologies or a static tech stack that hinders innovation
Senior AI Engineer Key Responsibilities Establishing frameworks that integrate generative AI into our engineering processes to significantly boost productivity
Basic Requirements Minimum 5 years of experience in software developmentMinimum 3 years as a primary technical contributor for a development team or software productExperience using generative AI for software engineering tasks or in products you've built

We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, synchronization, modeling divergences and data inconsistencies.
What we offer: The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented product people and engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are reshaping industries and making a difference in people's lives.

We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our product people and engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.If you’re passionate about designing and delivering high-quality software, we'd love to hear from you.What You Will Be Doing Breaking down high-level milestones into requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteriaIterating with our designers to transform use cases and user stories into functional UX/UI prototypesTaking any important technical decisions you feel strongly about (e.g., data model, 3rd-party patterns to use)Reviewing and accepting engineering deliverables, ensuring it meets all of your requirements

Basic Requirements At least 3 years of hands-on experience working as a software engineer.Knowledge of relational database fundamentals and hands-on experience writing SQL.Experience defining product/technical requirements and peer reviewing/accepting engineering deliverables.An openness to learn to heavily use generative A.I. in your day-to-day work.
Nice-to-have Requirements Experience in using generative A.I. in your day-to-day work (product or development).

Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?We're looking for an experienced technical product lead to turn high-level goals and milestones into actionable engineering work, for our strategic line of products: Crossover: An AI-powered hiring platform that sifts through millions of applicants per year to find the top 1% of global remote talent. We're breaking down geographical barriers and making high-paying jobs accessible to professionals worldwide, regardless of their location.gt.school: An online education platform that uses advanced data collection, algorithms, and AI-generated content to empower students to learn at their own pace. Our adaptive learning system fills knowledge gaps, accelerates learning, and helps students master a whole grade level on a subject within weeks.Data-driven Sales: This initiative leverages data and AI algorithms to streamline the sales process across a portfolio of over 100 software products. We're transitioning these products to a unified platform based on Salesforce and NetSuite, all while handling complex data imports, synchronization, modeling divergences and data inconsistencies.
What we offer: The opportunity to learn and experiment with using generative AI to boost your productivity.A team of exceptionally talented product people and engineers from around the world as your peers.The chance to work on products that are reshaping industries and making a difference in people's lives.
We're not just using AI as a buzzword. We're at the start of a thrilling journey with generative AI, experimenting and learning to fully leverage its potential and free our product people and engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters: design, decision-making, and understanding the far-reaching implications of different implementation strategies.If you’re passionate about designing and delivering high-quality software, we'd love to hear from you.What You Will Be Doing Breaking down high-level milestones into requirements, user stories, and acceptance criteriaIterating with our designers to transform use cases and user stories into functional UX/UI prototypesTaking any important technical decisions you feel strongly about (e.g., data model, 3rd-party patterns to use)Reviewing and accepting engineering deliverables, ensuring it meets all of your requirements
What You Won’t Be Doing Chasing developers to get their work and tasks delivered on timeManaging people or completing HR & administrative tasksPerforming low-level exhaustive quality assurance work
Senior Engineering Manager Key Responsibilities Create high-quality software releases by leveraging engineering talentEnsure the engineering deliverables snap together well and fully implement the milestoneImagine how users will interact with a product and develop robust use cases
Basic Requirements At least 3 years of hands-on experience working as a software engineer.Knowledge of relational database fundamentals and hands-on experience writing SQL.Experience defining product/technical requirements and peer reviewing/accepting engineering deliverables.An openness to learn to heavily use generative A.I. in your day-to-day work.
Nice-to-have Requirements Experience in using generative A.I. in your day-to-day work (product or development).
About TrilogyHundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!Working with CrossoverThis is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.What to expect next: You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.
Important! If you do not receive an email from us: First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

As a Sales Development Representative, we'll provide you the tools and resources to be successful - but this isn't the usual SDR role. Our SDR team is the front line of our Go-to-Market organization. You will be a critical part of our Sales Development team, responsible for responding to a range of inbound requests from event registrations to trials and webinar sign-ups. You will understand the needs of our users, and hand off the relationship to an Account Executive when appropriate. You will partner with Sales to develop engagement plans for acquiring new accounts. Identify new client opportunities, listen to clients' needs, and discuss the impact of our technology with prospects and community members. This is a great opportunity to help build out and expand our rapidly-growing Latin American team and market.Responsibilities Using, email, phone and social media, you will manage the initial sales process, including responding to inbound leads/tickets, understanding the customer's needs, identifying key client decision-makers, cross-selling opportunities and when is the right time to involve an Account ExecutiveCreate and evolve customized email and social media strategies for outreach to prospectsBuild rapport and long-term relationships with users and community membersMaintain a solid understanding of competitors, open source ecosystem, and industry trendsBe comfortable making decisions and working as an autonomous member of a collaborative teamMaintain speedy follow-up on inbound inquiries, responding to user requests within 2 business hoursSolve problems for Grafana users by leveraging discovery, collaboration, and research skills
Requirements Located in AustraliaMaintain a positive attitude in the face of criticism, rejection, or failureSuperior written and verbal communication skills, able to talk to and connect with all levels at an organizationProven history of following through with goals and commitmentsQuick learner, able to take initiative, excellent at problem solvingInsatiable sense of curiosity, always questioning and digging deeper for answersAble to think strategically and tacticallyDemonstration of success in a non-sales goal-oriented environment
Interview AdviceLet’s Be Honest - Interviewing Is Not Easy. However, We Want You To Come Prepared And Succeed. When We Interview, We’re Trying To Determine a Couple Of Things  Would you be successful if you were part of our team? Will you love working here and be a positive influence on your fellow colleagues? Will you grow professionally and personally during your time here?
We’re looking for people who are curious and passionate about technology, so make sure you invest some time in learning about Grafana Labs. Explore our community, the industry we operate in, what we offer, and how we set ourselves apart.During your interview, you’ll be sharing stories about your current and past roles and experiences. The best way to frame this is with the CARR model: Context, Action, Results, Reflection. This allows you to succinctly share the experiences you’ve gained.Remember, humility drives learning and we love working with people who are always trying to better themselves. Throughout our interview process, you will receive feedback, and usually directly in the interview. As you move through the interview process, make sure you listen to the feedback you receive and figure out how to incorporate the advice in the next step of the interview.About Grafana Labs: There are more than 950,000 active installations of Grafana around the globe, monitoring everything from beehives to climate change in the Alps. The instantly recognizable dashboards have been spotted everywhere from a NASA launch and Minecraft HQ to Wimbledon and the Tour de France. Grafana Labs also helps companies including Bloomberg, JPMorgan Chase, and eBay manage their observability strategies with full-stack offerings that can be run fully managed with Grafana Cloud, or self-managed with Grafana Enterprise Stack. The Grafana stack has grown to include four other open source projects, Grafana Loki (for logs), Grafana Tempo (for traces), Grafana Mimir (for metrics), and Grafana OnCall (for on-call management).Benefits: For more information about the perks and benefits of working at Grafana, please check out our careers page.Equal Opportunity Employer: At Grafana Labs we’re building a company where a diverse mix of talented people want to come, stay, and do their best work. We know that our company runs on the hard work and the dedication of our passionate and creative employees. If you're excited about this role but your experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyways.We will recruit, train, compensate and promote regardless of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, disability, age, veteran status, and all the other fascinating characteristics that make us different and unique. We believe that equality and diversity builds a strong organisation and we’re working hard to make sure that’s the foundation of our organisation as we grow.For information about how your personal data is used once you’ve applied to a job, check out our privacy policy.

Here's a comprehensive job description for a US Recruiting and Staffing Business Development Manager:Job Summary:The Business Development Manager is responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, developing and maintaining client relationships, and ensuring revenue growth within the US recruiting and staffing industry. They will be expected to create and implement strategic sales plans, understand client needs, and effectively communicate the agency's services to prospective clients.Key Responsibilities:Client Acquisition:·        Identify and target potential clients within the US recruiting and staffing industry.·        Conduct market research to understand client needs and industry trends.·        Develop a strong pipeline of leads and prospects through networking, cold calling, and other lead generation methods.Sales Strategy:·        Create and implement a comprehensive sales strategy and business development plan to achieve revenue targets.·        Collaborate with the executive team to set sales goals and targets.·        Develop and deliver compelling sales presentations and proposals.·        Client Relationship Management:·        Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with existing clients.·        Ensure client satisfaction by understanding their needs and addressing concerns.·        Identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling staffing services.Negotiation and Contracts: Negotiate terms and contracts with clients, ensuring they align with the agency's goals and policies.Prepare and present proposals and agreements to clients.
Reporting and Documentation:·        Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and client interactions.·        Generate regular reports on sales performance, revenue forecasts, and client engagement.Team Collaboration: Work closely with recruiting teams to ensure client needs are met and deliver high-quality service.Collaborate with marketing and operations teams to align business development efforts with overall agency goals.
Qualifications and Requirements:·        Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred) is a plus.·        Proven 3-5 years’ experience as a Business Development Manager in the US recruiting and staffing industry.·        Strong understanding of US staffing and employment/Contract services.·        Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.·        Ability to work independently and as part of a team.·        Results-driven with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.·        Familiarity with sales analytics tools.·        Knowledge of labor laws and regulations in the US is a plus.

Company DescriptionSMS Communications Private Ltd is an online educational institute that has been operating for more than three years in the USA and the UK. Though based in London, our administration staff works from Pakistan. Our aim is to add value to our students' education by making their learning experience simpler, easier, and more reliable.Role DescriptionWe are looking for a Senior Academic Tutor for O Levels and A Levels to join our team in Rawalpindi on a full-time basis. As an on-site role, you will be responsible for conducting one-on-one and group tutoring sessions, providing feedback on student progress, preparing lesson plans, and maintaining records of tutoring sessions.Job Description: We are seeking an experienced and enthusiastic tutor to join our team in providing high-quality educational support to O Levels and A Levels students.Responsibilities: Teaching: Deliver engaging and effective lessons to O Levels and A Levels students, covering relevant subjects and topics.Curriculum Development: Create lesson plans, study materials, and resources that align with the curriculum and learning objectives.Individualized Instruction: Tailor teaching methods to meet the unique needs and learning styles of individual students.Assessment: Regularly assess student progress and provide constructive feedback to help students achieve their academic goals.Mentoring: Offer guidance and support to students, motivating them to excel academically and helping them with study strategies.Maintain a Positive Learning Environment: Foster a positive and inclusive classroom atmosphere that encourages active participation and critical thinking.Communication: Keep parents or guardians informed about student progress and address any concerns or inquiries promptly.Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with the latest educational trends, teaching methodologies, and subject-specific developments.
Qualifications: A Bachelor's degree in the relevant subjects or a related field.A proven track record in teaching O Levels and A Levels students.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Patience, empathy, and the ability to connect with students.Proficiency in creating engaging and interactive learning materials.Familiarity with the O Levels and A Levels curriculum.
Preferred Skills: Teaching certification or relevant educational qualifications.Experience in teaching other advanced level programs, such as International Baccalaureate (IB) or Advanced Placement (AP), is a plus.
Salary and Benefits: Salary range typically between PKR 40,000 - 60,000 (depends upon interview points)Punctuality BonusJob Types: Full-time, Contract,

Job descriptionCompany DescriptionExtreme Dispatching LLC plays a pivotal role in the logistics and transportation industry by efficiently coordinating the movement of goods via trucks. These companies serve as intermediaries between shippers and truck drivers, ensuring that cargo is transported from point A to B seamlessly.Key responsibilities of a truck dispatching company include:1. **Route Planning:** Dispatchers plan the most efficient routes for deliveries, taking into account factors like traffic, weather, and delivery deadlines to optimize delivery times and reduce fuel costs.2. **Load Management:** They ensure that trucks are loaded safely and in compliance with weight regulations. This involves coordinating the loading and unloading of cargo.3. **Communication:** Dispatchers maintain constant communication with truck drivers, providing updates on routes, weather conditions, and any changes in delivery schedules.4. **Problem Solving:** When unexpected issues arise, such as breakdowns, accidents, or delays, dispatchers are responsible for finding solutions to minimize disruptions and keep shipments on track.5. **Documentation:** They handle paperwork, including bills of lading, invoices, and delivery receipts, ensuring that all necessary documentation is in order.6. **Compliance:** Dispatchers ensure that drivers comply with all relevant regulations, including hours-of-service rules and safety standards.7. **Customer Service:** They serve as a point of contact for both shippers and drivers, addressing any concerns or inquiries promptly.Truck dispatching companies rely on advanced software and communication tools to streamline their operations and provide real-time tracking and monitoring of shipments. Their role is crucial in maintaining the supply chain's efficiency and reliability, making them an integral part of the transportation industry.Role DescriptionSENIOR SALE AGENTS FOR TRUCKING COMPAIGNRequirements:FLUENT ENGLISH AND USA ACCENTExperience: 6 months minimumBASIC SALARY:25K to 80k as per ExperienceSubmit Resume: extremedispatchingllc@gmail.comMore Information: 0300-6608224Timing :7pm to 3 am Monday to FridayAddress: Askari Tower, GulbergQualifications• Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonalskills• Prior experience in sales or business development• Proven ability to generate new business and close sales• Solid understanding of call center.• Strong organizational and time management skills• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.• Fluency in English

About the job
            

 
We are currently seeking for a highly skilled and experienced IT Project Technician - Level 3. A Level 3 (L3) IT Technician with experience in Azure, O365, Intune migration, and networking knowledge is an asset. Here are key details about this role:  Responsibilities:  Azure and Intune Migration: As an L3 technician, your primary responsibility would be to lead and execute the migration of on-premises systems and services to Microsoft Azure, ensuring a seamless transition. You'll also implement and manage Microsoft Intune for mobile device management and application control. Technical Support: Providing high-level technical support to resolve complex issues and escalations that cannot be handled by L1 and L2 technicians. This includes diagnosing and troubleshooting network and system-related problems. Security: Ensuring the security of both on-premises and cloud-based systems is crucial. Implementing security best practices and maintaining compliance with security standards will be part of your responsibilities. Documentation: Maintaining accurate documentation of network configurations, system setups, and migration processes is essential for efficient operations and future troubleshooting. Collaboration: Collaborating with other IT teams and departments to align IT services with business objectives and needs. This includes working closely with system administrators, database administrators, and security teams.
Skills and Qualifications:  Azure and Intune Expertise: In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure, O365 and Intune are crucial for successful migration and device management. Proficient on Microsoft Modern Work suiteGood knowledge of Entra ID / Azure AD and IntuneExperience with Microsoft 365 mail and SharePoint management and migration requiredIT Certifications: Relevant certifications, such as Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate, Microsoft Certified: Intune Administrator, CompTIA Network+, and CompTIA Security+, demonstrate your expertise.Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills to diagnose and resolve complex technical issues effectively.Experience: Several years of experience in IT roles, including experience with Azure and Intune migration and network administration.Communication: Good communication skills, as you'll need to collaborate with various teams and convey technical information to non-technical stakeholders.Security Awareness: Understanding and implementing security best practices to protect network and system resources.An L3 IT Technician with experience in Azure, Intune migration, and networking knowledge plays a critical role in ensuring an organization's IT infrastructure is secure, efficient, and aligned with business needs. Your expertise in managing and troubleshooting both on-premises and cloud-based systems and networks is highly valuable in today's IT landscape. PowerShell knowledge highly recommended
